body: Joel Martinsen from DANWEI translates a news story from Youth Times [zh] on the Ministry of Railways' unfulfilled promise in solving the ticket shortage problem during the Spring Festival Rush.
original_body: Joel Martinsen from DANWEI translates a news story from Youth Times [zh] on the Ministry of Railways' unfulfilled promise in solving the ticket shortage problem during the Spring Festival Rush.
title: China: Ticket shortage unresolved for Spring Festival Rush
